nodes.text: Wil Film is a Danish film production company that produces animated television shows, shorts, and commercials. They have a production studio in Copenhagen and work with animation studios in China, India, and Malaysia. They have produced the outstanding TV series Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu and several LEGO Star Wars productions including the 2016 Disney XD children's animated TV series LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures.
